00037 #include <sys/types.h>
00038 #include <sys/stat.h>

00052 
00053 char *dir = NULL, *dir2 = NULL;
00054 long page_size;
00055 char mmap_sanity[256];
00056 
00057 static void usage(void)
00058 {
00059         printf("Usage: mmap_sanity -d dir [-m dir2] [-e <test cases>]\n");
00060         printf("       -d dir        lustre mount point\n");
00061         printf("       -m dir2       another mount point\n");
00062         printf("       -e testcases  skipped test cases, -e 1 -e 2 to exclude"
00063                                     " test cases 1 and 2.\n");
00064         exit(127);
00065 }
00066 
00067 static int remote_tst(int tc, char *mnt);
00068 static int mmap_run(int tc)
00069 {
00070         pid_t child;
00071         int rc = 0;
00072 
00073         child = fork();
00074         if (child < 0)
00075                 return -errno;
00076         else if (child)
00077                 return 0;
00078 
00079         if (dir2 != NULL) {
00080                 rc = remote_tst(tc, dir2);
00081         } else {
00082                 rc = -EINVAL;
00083                 fprintf(stderr, "invalid argument!\n");
00084         }
00085         _exit(rc);
00086 }
00087 
00088 static int mmap_initialize(char *myself)
00089 {
00090         char buf[1024], *file;
00091         int fdr, fdw, count, rc = 0;
00092 
00093         page_size = sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE);
00094         if (page_size == -1) {
00095                 perror("sysconf(_SC_PAGESIZE)");
00096                 return -errno;
00097         }
00098 
00099         /* copy myself to lustre for another client */
00100         fdr = open(myself, O_RDONLY);
00101         if (fdr < 0) {
00102                 perror(myself);
00103                 return -EINVAL;
00104         }
00105         file = strrchr(myself, '/');
00106         if (file == NULL) {
00107                 fprintf(stderr, "can't get test filename\n");
00108                 close(fdr);
00109                 return -EINVAL;
00110         }
00111         file++;
00112         sprintf(mmap_sanity, "%s/%s", dir, file);
00113 
00114         fdw = open(mmap_sanity, O_CREAT|O_WRONLY, 0777);
00115         if (fdw < 0) {
00116                 perror(mmap_sanity);
00117                 close(fdr);
00118                 return -EINVAL;
00119         }
00120         while ((count = read(fdr, buf, sizeof(buf))) != 0) {
00121                 int writes;
00122 
00123                 if (count < 0) {
00124                         perror("read()");
00125                         rc = -errno;
00126                         break;
00127                 }
00128                 writes = write(fdw, buf, count);
00129                 if (writes != count) {
00130                         perror("write()");
00131                         rc = -errno;
00132                         break;
00133                 }
00134         }
00135         close(fdr);
00136         close(fdw);
00137         return rc;
00138 }
00139 
00140 static void mmap_finalize()
00141 {
00142         unlink(mmap_sanity);
00143 }
00144 
00145 /* basic mmap operation on single node */
00146 static int mmap_tst1(char *mnt)
00147 {
00148         char *ptr, mmap_file[256];
00149         int region, fd, rc = 0;
00150 
00151         region = page_size * 10;
00152         sprintf(mmap_file, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file1");
00153 
00154         if (unlink(mmap_file) && errno != ENOENT) {
00155                 perror("unlink()");
00156                 return -errno;
00157         }
00158 
00159         fd = open(mmap_file, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00160         if (fd < 0) {
00161                 perror(mmap_file);
00162                 return -errno;
00163         }
00164         if (ftruncate(fd, region) < 0) {
00165                 perror("ftruncate()");
00166                 rc = -errno;
00167                 goto out_close;
00168         }
00169 
00170         ptr = mmap(NULL, region, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00171         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00172                 perror("mmap()");
00173                 rc = -errno;
00174                 goto out_close;
00175         }
00176         memset(ptr, 'a', region);
00177 
00178         munmap(ptr, region);
00179 out_close:
00180         close(fd);
00181         unlink(mmap_file);
00182         return rc;
00183 }
00184 
00185 /* MAP_PRIVATE create a copy-on-write mmap */
00186 static int mmap_tst2(char *mnt)
00187 {
00188         char *ptr, mmap_file[256], buf[256];
00189         int fd, rc = 0;
00190 
00191         sprintf(mmap_file, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file2");
00192 
00193         if (unlink(mmap_file) && errno != ENOENT) {
00194                 perror("unlink()");
00195                 return -errno;
00196         }
00197 
00198         fd = open(mmap_file, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00199         if (fd < 0) {
00200                 perror(mmap_file);
00201                 return -errno;
00202         }
00203         if (ftruncate(fd, page_size) < 0) {
00204                 perror("ftruncate()");
00205                 rc = -errno;
00206                 goto out_close;
00207         }
00208 
00209         ptr = mmap(NULL, page_size, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_PRIVATE, fd, 0);
00210         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00211                 perror("mmap()");
00212                 rc = -errno;
00213                 goto out_close;
00214         }
00215         memcpy(ptr, "blah", strlen("blah"));
00216 
00217         munmap(ptr, page_size);
00218 out_close:
00219         close(fd);
00220         if (rc)
00221                 return -rc;
00222 
00223         fd = open(mmap_file, O_RDONLY);
00224         if (fd < 0) {
00225                 perror(mmap_file);
00226                 return -errno;
00227         }
00228         rc = read(fd, buf, sizeof(buf));
00229         if (rc < 0) {
00230                 perror("read()");
00231                 rc = -errno;
00232                 goto out_close;
00233         }
00234         rc = 0;
00235 
00236         if (strncmp("blah", buf, strlen("blah")) == 0) {
00237                 fprintf(stderr, "mmap write back with MAP_PRIVATE!\n");
00238                 rc = -EFAULT;
00239         }
00240         close(fd);
00241         unlink(mmap_file);
00242         return rc;
00243 }

00245 /* concurrent mmap operations on two nodes */
00246 static int mmap_tst3(char *mnt)
00247 {
00248         char *ptr, mmap_file[256];
00249         int region, fd, rc = 0;
00250 
00251         region = page_size * 100;
00252         sprintf(mmap_file, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file3");
00253 
00254         if (unlink(mmap_file) && errno != ENOENT) {
00255                 perror("unlink()");
00256                 return -errno;
00257         }
00258 
00259         fd = open(mmap_file, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00260         if (fd < 0) {
00261                 perror(mmap_file);
00262                 return -errno;
00263         }
00264         if (ftruncate(fd, region) < 0) {
00265                 perror("ftruncate()");
00266                 rc = -errno;
00267                 goto out_close;
00268         }
00269 
00270         ptr = mmap(NULL, region, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00271         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00272                 perror("mmap()");
00273                 rc = -errno;
00274                 goto out_close;
00275         }
00276 
00277         rc = mmap_run(3);
00278         if (rc)
00279                 goto out_unmap;
00280 
00281         memset(ptr, 'a', region);
00282         sleep(2);       /* wait for remote test finish */
00283 out_unmap:
00284         munmap(ptr, region);
00285 out_close:
00286         close(fd);
00287         unlink(mmap_file);
00288         return rc;
00289 }
00290 
00291 static int remote_tst3(char *mnt)
00292 {
00293         char *ptr, mmap_file[256];
00294         int region, fd, rc = 0;
00295 
00296         region = page_size * 100;
00297         sprintf(mmap_file, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file3");
00298 
00299         fd = open(mmap_file, O_RDWR, 0600);
00300         if (fd < 0) {
00301                 perror(mmap_file);
00302                 return -errno;
00303         }
00304 
00305         ptr = mmap(NULL, region, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00306         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00307                 perror("mmap()");
00308                 rc = -errno;
00309                 goto out_close;
00310         }
00311         memset(ptr, 'b', region);
00312         memset(ptr, 'c', region);
00313 
00314         munmap(ptr, region);
00315 out_close:
00316         close(fd);
00317         return rc;
00318 }
00319 
00320 /* client1 write to file_4a from mmap()ed file_4b;
00321  * client2 write to file_4b from mmap()ed file_4a. */
00322 static int mmap_tst4(char *mnt)
00323 {
00324         char *ptr, filea[256], fileb[256];
00325         int region, fdr, fdw, rc = 0;
00326 
00327         region = page_size * 100;
00328         sprintf(filea, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file_4a");
00329         sprintf(fileb, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file_4b");
00330 
00331         if (unlink(filea) && errno != ENOENT) {
00332                 perror("unlink()");
00333                 return -errno;
00334         }
00335         if (unlink(fileb) && errno != ENOENT) {
00336                 perror("unlink()");
00337                 return -errno;
00338         }
00339 
00340         fdr = fdw = -1;
00341         fdr = open(fileb, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00342         if (fdr < 0) {
00343                 perror(fileb);
00344                 return -errno;
00345         }
00346         if (ftruncate(fdr, region) < 0) {
00347                 perror("ftruncate()");
00348                 rc = -errno;
00349                 goto out_close;
00350         }
00351         fdw = open(filea, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00352         if (fdw < 0) {
00353                 perror(filea);
00354                 rc = -errno;
00355                 goto out_close;
00356         }
00357         if (ftruncate(fdw, region) < 0) {
00358                 perror("ftruncate()");
00359                 rc = -errno;
00360                 goto out_close;
00361         }
00362 
00363         ptr = mmap(NULL, region, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fdr, 0);
00364         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00365                 perror("mmap()");
00366                 rc = -errno;
00367                 goto out_close;
00368         }
00369 
00370         rc = mmap_run(4);
00371         if (rc)
00372                 goto out_unmap;
00373 
00374         memset(ptr, '1', region);
00375 
00376         rc = write(fdw, ptr, region);
00377         if (rc <= 0) {
00378                 perror("write()");
00379                 rc = -errno;
00380         } else
00381                 rc = 0;
00382 
00383         sleep(2);       /* wait for remote test finish */
00384 out_unmap:
00385         munmap(ptr, region);
00386 out_close:
00387         if (fdr >= 0)
00388                 close(fdr);
00389         if (fdw >= 0)
00390                 close(fdw);
00391         unlink(filea);
00392         unlink(fileb);
00393         return rc;
00394 }
00395 
00396 static int remote_tst4(char *mnt)
00397 {
00398         char *ptr, filea[256], fileb[256];
00399         int region, fdr, fdw, rc = 0;
00400 
00401         region = page_size * 100;
00402         sprintf(filea, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file_4a");
00403         sprintf(fileb, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file_4b");
00404 
00405         fdr = fdw = -1;
00406         fdr = open(filea, O_RDWR, 0600);
00407         if (fdr < 0) {
00408                 perror(filea);
00409                 return -errno;
00410         }
00411         fdw = open(fileb, O_RDWR, 0600);
00412         if (fdw < 0) {
00413                 perror(fileb);
00414                 rc = -errno;
00415                 goto out_close;
00416         }
00417 
00418         ptr = mmap(NULL, region, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fdr, 0);
00419         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00420                 perror("mmap()");
00421                 rc = -errno;
00422                 goto out_close;
00423         }
00424 
00425         memset(ptr, '2', region);
00426 
00427         rc = write(fdw, ptr, region);
00428         if (rc <= 0) {
00429                 perror("write()");
00430                 rc = -errno;
00431         } else
00432                 rc = 0;
00433 
00434         munmap(ptr, region);
00435 out_close:
00436         if (fdr >= 0)
00437                 close(fdr);
00438         if (fdw >= 0)
00439                 close(fdw);
00440         return rc;
00441 }
00442 
00443 static int cancel_lru_locks(char *filter)
00444 {
00445         glob_t paths;
00446         pid_t child;
00447         int rc, i;
00448 
00449         child = fork();
00450         if (child < 0)
00451                 return -errno;
00452         else if (child) {
00453                 int status;
00454 
00455                 rc = waitpid(child, &status, WNOHANG);
00456                 if (rc == child)
00457                         rc = 0;
00458                 return rc;
00459         }
00460 
00461         if (filter != NULL)
00462                 rc = cfs_get_param_paths(&paths,
00463                                         "ldlm/namespaces/*-%s-*/lru_size",
00464                                         filter);
00465         else
00466                 rc = cfs_get_param_paths(&paths,
00467                                         "ldlm/namespaces/*/lru_size");
00468         if (rc != 0)
00469                 return -EINVAL;
00470 
00471         for (i = 0; i < paths.gl_pathc; i++) {
00472                 FILE *f = fopen(paths.gl_pathv[i], "r");
00473                 if (f == NULL) {
00474                         rc = -errno;
00475                         fprintf(stderr, "cannot open '%s': %s\n",
00476                                 paths.gl_pathv[i], strerror(errno));
00477                         break;
00478                 }
00479 
00480                 rc = fwrite("clear", strlen("clear") + 1, 1, f);
00481                 if (rc < 1) {
00482                         rc = -errno;
00483                         fprintf(stderr, "fwrite failed for '%s': %s\n",
00484                                 paths.gl_pathv[i], strerror(errno));
00485                         fclose(f);
00486                         break;
00487                 }
00488                 fclose(f);
00489         }
00490 
00491         cfs_free_param_data(&paths);
00492         _exit(rc);
00493 }
00494 
00495 /* don't dead lock while read/write file to/from the buffer which
00496  * mmaped to just this file */
00497 static int mmap_tst5(char *mnt)
00498 {
00499         char *ptr, mmap_file[256];
00500         int region, fd, off, rc = 0;
00501 
00502         region = page_size * 40;
00503         off = page_size * 10;
00504         sprintf(mmap_file, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file5");
00505 
00506         if (unlink(mmap_file) && errno != ENOENT) {
00507                 perror("unlink()");
00508                 return -errno;
00509         }
00510 
00511         fd = open(mmap_file, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00512         if (fd < 0) {
00513                 perror(mmap_file);
00514                 return -errno;
00515         }
00516         if (ftruncate(fd, region) < 0) {
00517                 perror("ftruncate()");
00518                 rc = -errno;
00519                 goto out_close;
00520         }
00521 
00522         ptr = mmap(NULL, region, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00523         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00524                 perror("mmap()");
00525                 rc = -errno;
00526                 goto out_close;
00527         }
00528         memset(ptr, 'a', region);
00529 
00530         /* cancel unused locks */
00531         rc = cancel_lru_locks("osc");
00532         if (rc)
00533                 goto out_unmap;
00534 
00535         /* read/write region of file and buffer should be overlap */
00536         rc = read(fd, ptr + off, off * 2);
00537         if (rc != off * 2) {
00538                 perror("read()");
00539                 rc = -errno;
00540                 goto out_unmap;
00541         }
00542         rc = write(fd, ptr + off, off * 2);
00543         if (rc != off * 2) {
00544                 perror("write()");
00545                 rc = -errno;
00546         }
00547         rc = 0;
00548 out_unmap:
00549         munmap(ptr, region);
00550 out_close:
00551         close(fd);
00552         unlink(mmap_file);
00553         return rc;
00554 }
00555 
00556 /* mmap write to a file form client1 then mmap read from client2 */
00557 static int mmap_tst6(char *mnt)
00558 {
00559         char mmap_file[256], mmap_file2[256];
00560         char *ptr = NULL, *ptr2 = NULL;
00561         int fd = 0, fd2 = 0, rc = 0;
00562 
00563         sprintf(mmap_file, "%s/%s", mnt, "mmap_file6");
00564         sprintf(mmap_file2, "%s/%s", dir2, "mmap_file6");
00565         if (unlink(mmap_file) && errno != ENOENT) {
00566                 perror("unlink()");
00567                 return -errno;
00568         }
00569 
00570         fd = open(mmap_file, O_CREAT|O_RDWR, 0600);
00571         if (fd < 0) {
00572                 perror(mmap_file);
00573                 return -errno;
00574         }
00575         if (ftruncate(fd, page_size) < 0) {
00576                 perror("ftruncate()");
00577                 rc = -errno;
00578                 goto out;
00579         }
00580 
00581         fd2 = open(mmap_file2, O_RDWR, 0600);
00582         if (fd2 < 0) {
00583                 perror(mmap_file2);
00584                 rc = -errno;
00585                 goto out;
00586         }
00587 
00588         ptr = mmap(NULL, page_size, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00589         if (ptr == MAP_FAILED) {
00590                 perror("mmap()");
00591                 rc = -errno;
00592                 goto out;
00593         }
00594 
00595         ptr2 = mmap(NULL, page_size, PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd2, 0);
00596         if (ptr2 == MAP_FAILED) {
00597                 perror("mmap()");
00598                 rc = -errno;
00599                 goto out;
00600         }
00601 
00602         rc = cancel_lru_locks("osc");
00603         if (rc)
00604                 goto out;
00605 
00606         memcpy(ptr, "blah", strlen("blah"));
00607         if (strncmp(ptr, ptr2, strlen("blah"))) {
00608                 fprintf(stderr, "client2 mmap mismatch!\n");
00609                 rc = -EFAULT;
00610                 goto out;
00611         }
00612         memcpy(ptr2, "foo", strlen("foo"));
00613         if (strncmp(ptr, ptr2, strlen("foo"))) {
00614                 fprintf(stderr, "client1 mmap mismatch!\n");
00615                 rc = -EFAULT;
00616         }
00617 out:
00618         if (ptr2)
00619                 munmap(ptr2, page_size);
00620         if (ptr)
00621                 munmap(ptr, page_size);
00622         if (fd2 > 0)
00623                 close(fd2);
00624         if (fd > 0)
00625                 close(fd);
00626         unlink(mmap_file);
00627         return rc;
00628 }
00629 
00630 static int mmap_tst7_func(char *mnt, int rw)
00631 {
00632         char  fname[256];
00633         char *buf = MAP_FAILED;
00634         ssize_t bytes;
00635         int fd = -1;
00636         int rc = 0;
00637 
00638         if (snprintf(fname, 256, "%s/mmap_tst7.%s", mnt,
00639                      (rw == 0) ? "read" : "write") >= 256) {
00640                 fprintf(stderr, "dir name too long\n");
00641                 rc = -ENAMETOOLONG;
00642                 goto out;
00643         }
00644         fd = open(fname, O_RDWR | O_DIRECT | O_CREAT, 0644);
00645         if (fd == -1) {
00646                 perror("open");
00647                 rc = -errno;
00648                 goto out;
00649         }
00650         if (ftruncate(fd, 2 * page_size) == -1) {
00651                 perror("truncate");
00652                 rc = -errno;
00653                 goto out;
00654         }
00655         buf = mmap(NULL, page_size * 2,
00656                    PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_PRIVATE | MAP_ANONYMOUS, -1, 0);
00657         if (buf == MAP_FAILED) {
00658                 perror("mmap");
00659                 rc = -errno;
00660                 goto out;
00661         }
00662         /* ensure the second page isn't mapped */
00663         munmap(buf + page_size, page_size);
00664         bytes = (rw == 0) ? read(fd, buf, 2 * page_size) :
00665                             write(fd, buf, 2 * page_size);
00666         /* Expected behavior */
00667         if (bytes == page_size)
00668                 goto out;
00669 
00670         fprintf(stderr, "%s returned %zd, errno = %d\n",
00671                 (rw == 0) ? "read" : "write", bytes, errno);
00672         rc = -EIO;
00673 out:
00674         if (buf != MAP_FAILED)
00675                 munmap(buf, page_size);
00676         if (fd != -1)
00677                 close(fd);
00678         return rc;
00679 }
00680 
00681 static int mmap_tst7(char *mnt)
00682 {
00683         int rc;
00684 
00685         rc = mmap_tst7_func(mnt, 0);
00686         if (rc != 0)
00687                 return rc;
00688         rc = mmap_tst7_func(mnt, 1);
00689         return rc;
00690 }
00691 
00692 static int mmap_tst8(char *mnt)
00693 {
00694         char  fname[256];
00695         char *buf = MAP_FAILED;
00696         int fd = -1;
00697         int rc = 0;
00698         pid_t pid;
00699         char xyz[page_size * 2];
00700 
00701         if (snprintf(fname, 256, "%s/mmap_tst8", mnt) >= 256) {
00702                 fprintf(stderr, "dir name too long\n");
00703                 rc = -ENAMETOOLONG;
00704                 goto out;
00705         }
00706         fd = open(fname, O_RDWR | O_CREAT, 0644);
00707         if (fd == -1) {
00708                 perror("open");
00709                 rc = -errno;
00710                 goto out;
00711         }
00712         if (ftruncate(fd, page_size) == -1) {
00713                 perror("truncate");
00714                 rc = -errno;
00715                 goto out;
00716         }
00717         buf = mmap(NULL, page_size * 2,
00718                    PROT_READ | PROT_WRITE, MAP_SHARED, fd, 0);
00719         if (buf == MAP_FAILED) {
00720                 perror("mmap");
00721                 rc = -errno;
00722                 goto out;
00723         }
00724 
00725         pid = fork();
00726         if (pid == 0) { /* child */
00727                 memcpy(xyz, buf, page_size * 2);
00728                 /* shouldn't reach here. */
00729                 exit(0);
00730         } else if (pid > 0) { /* parent */
00731                 int status = 0;
00732                 pid = waitpid(pid, &status, 0);
00733                 if (pid < 0) {
00734                         perror("wait");
00735                         rc = -errno;
00736                         goto out;
00737                 }
00738 
00739                 rc = -EFAULT;
00740                 if (WIFSIGNALED(status) && SIGBUS == WTERMSIG(status))
00741                         rc = 0;
00742         } else {
00743                 perror("fork");
00744                 rc = -errno;
00745         }
00746 
00747 out:
00748         if (buf != MAP_FAILED)
00749                 munmap(buf, page_size);
00750         if (fd != -1)
00751                 close(fd);
00752         return rc;
00753 }
00754 
00755 static int remote_tst(int tc, char *mnt)
00756 {
00757         int rc = 0;
00758         switch (tc) {
00759         case 3:
00760                 rc = remote_tst3(mnt);
00761                 break;
00762         case 4:
00763                 rc = remote_tst4(mnt);
00764                 break;
00765         default:
00766                 fprintf(stderr, "wrong test case number %d\n", tc);
00767                 rc = -EINVAL;
00768                 break;
00769         }
00770         return rc;
00771 }
00772 
00773 struct test_case {
00774         int     tc;                     /* test case number */
00775         char    *desc;                  /* test description */
00776         int     (*test_fn)(char *mnt);  /* test function */
00777         int     node_cnt;               /* node count */
00778         int     skipped;                /* skipped by caller */
00779 };
00780 
00781 struct test_case tests[] = {
00782         { 1, "mmap test1: basic mmap operation", mmap_tst1, 1 },
00783         { 2, "mmap test2: MAP_PRIVATE not write back", mmap_tst2, 1 },
00784         { 3, "mmap test3: concurrent mmap ops on two nodes", mmap_tst3, 2 },
00785         { 4, "mmap test4: c1 write to f1 from mmapped f2, "
00786              "c2 write to f1 from mmapped f1", mmap_tst4, 2 },
00787         { 5, "mmap test5: read/write file to/from the buffer "
00788              "which mmapped to just this file", mmap_tst5, 1 },
00789         { 6, "mmap test6: check mmap write/read content on two nodes",
00790                 mmap_tst6, 2 },
00791         { 7, "mmap test7: file i/o with an unmapped buffer", mmap_tst7, 1},
00792         { 8, "mmap test8: SIGBUS for beyond file size", mmap_tst8, 1 },
00793         { 0, NULL, 0, 0 }
00794 };
00795 
00796 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00797 {
00798         struct test_case *test;
00799         int nr_cases = sizeof(tests)/sizeof(*test);
00800         int c, rc = 0;
00801 
00802         while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "d:m:e:")) != -1) {
00803                 switch (c) {
00804                 case 'd':
00805                         dir = optarg;
00806                         break;
00807                 case 'm':
00808                         dir2 = optarg;
00809                         break;
00810                 case 'e': {
00811                         char *endptr = NULL;
00812                         rc = strtol(optarg, &endptr, 10);
00813                         if (endptr != NULL && *endptr != '\0')
00814                                 usage();
00815                         if (rc > 0 && rc < nr_cases)
00816                                 tests[rc - 1].skipped = 1;
00817                         break;
00818                 }
00819                 default:
00820                         usage();
00821                         break;
00822                 }
00823         }
00824 
00825         if (dir == NULL)
00826                 usage();
00827 
00828         if (mmap_initialize(argv[0]) != 0) {
00829                 fprintf(stderr, "mmap_initialize failed!\n");
00830                 return -EINVAL;
00831         }
00832 
00833         rc = 0;
00834         for (test = tests; test->tc; test++) {
00835                 double duration = 0.0;
00836                 char *rs = "SKIPPED";
00837 
00838                 if (!test->skipped && (test->node_cnt == 1 || dir2 != NULL)) {
00839                         struct timeval start, end;
00840 
00841                         gettimeofday(&start, NULL);
00842                         rc = test->test_fn(dir);
00843                         gettimeofday(&end, NULL);
00844 
00845                         duration = (double)(end.tv_sec - start.tv_sec) +
00846                                 (double)(end.tv_usec - start.tv_usec) / 1000000;
00847                         rs = rc ? "FAIL" : "PASS";
00848                 }
00849 
00850                 fprintf(stderr, "%s (%s, %.5gs)\n", test->desc, rs, duration);
00851                 if (rc)
00852                         break;
00853         }
00854 
00855         mmap_finalize();
00856         return -rc;
00857 }
